Texts.Eng: Good work, Captain. I will have these materials brought to Ayurin so he can start working on the frame. In the mean time, I have another task for you.

I could help you build a new weapon using this core, but you will need to gather the materials. ^green;Bring me ^orange;32 pieces of Centensian Metal^green;, along with ^orange;12 pieces of Centensian Tech^reset;, and I will have Ayurin build a new frame for the weapon.
